title: Lawyers for Former Officer Who Killed Daunte Wright to Argue Death Was ‘Innocent Mistake’
sub_head: Kimberly Potter, a 26-year veteran, shot Mr. Wright with 9mm handgun while saying ‘I’ll tase ya’
body:
The killing of Daunte Wright by former Brooklyn Center, Minn., police officer Kimberly Potter was an innocent mistake, lawyers for the officer argued in a recent court filing.
Ms. Potter, a 26-year veteran officer, shot Mr. Wright during a traffic stop in April this year and immediately indicated in video of the incident that she thought she had grabbed her taser, according to the criminal complaint. She faces charges of first- and second-degree manslaughter.
